name: Hoofit Racing
description:
Steer your rider to victory in this cute and wacky all ages mobile racing game. Dodge chickens, cows, pigs, sheep and other hazards as you race around unique hand crafted highly optimized race tracks. Pick up and drop items behind you to take out other players, dodge hazards dropped by others. Races are short and sweet and packed with fast paced action that'll make you laugh.

Built by a team of 2 over several years, one developer and one artist, we've poured our hearts into it and are still working hard to build it out. It's a work in progress.
